name: BigML
overview:
BigML offers a highly scalable, cloud based machine learning service that is easy to use, seamless to integrate and instantly actionable.

machine learning can be used to analyze and predict: ✓ customer behavior, to increase customer loyalty ✓ site visit behavior, to increase site conversion ✓diagnostics, to support in health care, hardware maintenance and many other area’s ✓risk profiles, to process loan applications ✓stock levels, to optimize supply of goods ✓and many, many other applications, where finding patterns in data creates new insights and using those patterns to predict creates new value.

Through a simple to use interface, users can quickly analyze their data and build predictive models without any prior expertise. The user can explore these models for new insights and use them to make predictions.

This technology can be simply integrated with user’s applications through a downloadable format of the model or by using the fully documented API.

video_embeds.description: BigML helps Wendy in her WIne Store
